subject: Litilica mu Cibemba

topics.description: Muli uyu mutwe abasambi balaishiba ifikomo ifikalamba ifisangwa mumalyashi ayalekana-lekana ukulingana na ifyo yashimikwe. Kabili balaishiba ukulondolo intampulo shakukonka pakwishiba umutwe uupelwe mu ilyashi lyakulandafye.

instructional_blocks.description: Abasambi bafwile ukulondolola intampulo shakukonka pa kufwaya ifikomo ifikankala ifipeelwe mu ilyashi nangu ifili mukati ka ilyashi lyakulandafye
teacher_steps: Eba abasambi bapeele intampulo shakukonka pakufwaya imitwe iikankala iili mu ilyashi lyakulandafye
Ukumfwikisha ilyo baleshimika ilyashi. Ulingile waumfwikisha wabikako amano kufyo balelanda
Ukufwailisha imilandu ilepinkana mulyashi baleshimika
Ukufwaya ubwafya buli mu ilyashi baleshimiika ubulengele ukuti pabe ukupinkana
Bafwaye ubwafya nga bufumine mukati kamushi nangu bwakwisafye atemwa fyonse fiibili
Ukufwailisha imilandu mukati ka ilyashi iilebwekela-bwekelapo nangula iilelandwapo libililibili
Ukumona ngacakutila bakalanda wa ilyashi baleyaluka nangula bakonkenyepofye ukwiminina ukutungilila ulubali lwabo atemwa iyoo
Ukulengulula intendekelo ya ilyashi na incende baleshimikilako
Ukufwailisha umulandu uo bakalanda wa ilyashi balefwaya ukuti icintubwingi cumfwe
Ukufwailisha isambililo ilikalamba ilyo umulandu ulelandapo ilyo bakalanda balefwaya ukuti lingasabankanishiwa ku bantu
Ukwakanya ilyashi mufikomo ifyo bakalanda balondolwele mulyashi

instructional_blocks.example_text: Patile akantu, kaikele nga ifi. Abantu balikele mumushi uukalamba nganshi. Ishina lyamushi uyu lyali ni Kolosa mu caalo camfumu ba Nondo. Muli uyu mushi na imishi iimbi iya ushingulwike mwaliponene insala yacipesha amano...

examples.description: Mu lushimi muli insala pamulandu wa cilala imfula tayalokele
Uyu mutwe uuli pali umo ulelanda pafyo abantu baile ku ng'anga ilyo baponenwe na icilala
Uyu mutwe ulelanga icilye caitilwe pafyo bengapwisha ubwafya bwa cilala
Uyu mutwe nao ulelanga ifyo Lesa ayaswike amapepo na ukulosha imfula
Ukutwala ifyabupe ku mipashi pakuti imipashi yafikolwe yasuke na ukupeela abantu ico balefwaya; imfula

detailed_explanations.explanation: mutwe umo uuli mu kashimi pantu natumfwa uko ulushimi lwalanda pa nsala yaponene mu mushi mwa Kolosa. Na iyi insala yaponeene pa mulandu wakuti imfula tayalokele
Imfula ukukana loka pamyaka ibili, akashimi nakabili nakakwata umutwe ulelanda pa cilala pantu kulaba limo ilyo imfula ikaana ukuloka
Uyu nao umutwe uuli pali umo ulelanda pafyo abantu baya ku ng'anga ilyo lyonse baponenwa na ubwafya
Uyu mutwe uletulanga ukuti pakati kabantu nga paisa ubwafya ubuli bonse, kulaba ukulongona na ukwesha ukulashanya ifyo bengapwisha ubo ubwafya
uyu mutwe nao uli mu lushimi. Twaumfwa umulandu wa kwipusha Lesa pamulandu wa bwafya abantu bakwete
Ukutwala ifyabupe ku mipashi pakuti imipashi yafikolwe yasuke na ukupeela abantu ico balefwaya

expected_outcomes: Imitwe ili mu lushimi ya londololwa ukufikapo

sub_topics.short_notes: Ili isambililo lyakomaila na ukulanda pafisangwa mu lyashi lyakulandafye. Mulyashi yakulandafye mulasangwa ifikomo ifya pusana-pusana ifyo bakalanda naba komfwa bafwile baishiba umofilolele na isambililo fingapeela ku bantu. Teapo peka iyoo abasambi nabeshiba ukuti cilalyashi yakulandafye lyalikwata intampulo isho bafwile baishiba nangu bakonka pakufwaya imitwe iili mu lyashi lyakulandafye.

Nga nikufilengwa na Lesa, ukupinkana kucita ifintu ifishayana ifingalenga ubusanso mu bumi bwaba bantu. Abasambi balaishiba ukuti inshimi na imilumbe yonse ilembwa pakuti abantunse bengasanga inshila shakupwishishamo amafya bashingwana nayo mu bwikashi bwabo.

analysis_points.example: Mulyashi lipeelwe Shikulu Mwansa atendeke ilyashi lyakwe ilyo aleshimikila abeshikulu. Mulyashi lyakwe mwali intedekelo emukuti apo ilyashi lyakupusuka lyatendekele - bamutuma mu kuteba inkuni icungulo mu ncende iyasapa.

Mulyashi lipeelwe muli ukulondolola ubwingalenga uuleumfwa kulyashi ukwelenganya ifyo ncende yali ukufuma ku mashiwi ayapala - umushishi ukwenda ku mutwe, ifyulu ifyakwete insefu ifingi, incende iyafina.
Kashimika wa ilyashi lipelwe emo ali mulyashi line. Ico icilelanga ukuti ilyashi limikilwe first person singular (ine).

expected_outcomes: Imisango ya nshila yakushimikilamo ilyashi yalondololwa umupwilapo

sub_topics.short_notes: Abasambi basambilila ukulumbula inshila shakushimikilamo ilyashi elyo na ukulondolola umo shalolola na ifyo bashibomfya. Ilyo ilyashi lileshimikwa, lishimikilwa mu misango itatu; iyi misango kuti yaba ni Linear (Ukushimika ilyashi ukutula kuntendekelo ukufika kumpela ukukonka icibalilepo ukucitika mpaka ku cacitike pakulekelesha), Descriptive (Ukushimika ilyashi pakuti uuleumfwako akwate ukwelenganya kwafikapo pafyo aleumfwa), elyo na Point of view (Ukushimika ilyashi ukulolesha pauleshimika na imitontonkanishe yakwe)

sub_topics.title: Ifibombelo babomfya pa kupanga inshimi
competences: Abasambi baleenekelwa ukwishiba ifyo bapanga ulushimi atemwa umulumbe ukubomfya ifibombelo ifyapusana-pusana ifyo babomfya pa kupanga inshimi na imilumbe
learning_outcomes: Ukupanga ulushimi atemwa umulumbe ukubomfya ifibombelo fyapusana-pusana
Ukubomfya ifibombelo babomfya pa kupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe mu kashimi bapangile
Ukushimika ulushimi atemwa umulumbe bapangile
Ukulondolola ifibombelo babomfeshe mu lushimi atemwa mu mulumbe bapangile
Ukupanga akasela ukufuma mu lushimi atemwa mu mulumbe bapangile

instructional_blocks.description: Abasambi bafwile bapanga ulushimi atemwa umulumbe ukubomfya ifibombelo ifyapusana-pusana
teacher_steps: Eba abasambi bapange ulushimi nangu umulumbe umo babomfeshe ifibombelo ifyapusana-pusana
learner_steps: Bapange ulushimi atewma umulumbe ukubomfya ifibombelo babomfya pakupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe

story_elements.description: Emukuti ifyo ulushimi lutantikwe ukutula kuntendekelo ukushinta na kumpela. Bushe cintu nshi cibalilepo ukucitika elyo na icakonkapo mpaka ukufika kumpela
uko ifili mu nshimi atemwa mu milumbe filecitikila
ifisangwa mu nshimi atemwa mu milumbe

story_elements.element: Point of view (Imishimikile ya ulushimi atemwa umulumbe)
story_elements.description: Bushe kalemba alefwaya ukuti ilyo ulebelenga ube nga umo uuli mulyashi, atemwa alefwaya ilyo ulebelenga cibe nga weuleshimikilwafye
Ifintu fikankala ifyo kalemba alefwaya abalebelenga basambililemo

instructional_blocks.example_story: Kancule na Kasonde - Patile akantu, kaikele ngeefyo, mu mushi umo uwaleitwa Kwaletwa mwalikele abantu abengi...
expected_outcomes: Ulushimi atemwa umulumbe wapangwa ukubomfya ifibombelo babomfya pa kupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe bwino-bwino

instructional_blocks.description: Abasambi babomfye ifibombelo babomfya pa kupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe mu kashimi bapangile
teacher_steps: Eba abasambi babomfye ifibombelo babomfya pakupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe mu kashimi bapangile
learner_steps: Babomfye ifibombelo babomfya pakupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe mu kashimi bapangile
story_elements_identified: Setting (Incende): Mu mushi mwakwaletwa, ku mitanda, amawanga ya mumana wa Kambwititi
Characters (Abantu balimo): Kancule, imfumu Mwendanakawele, Kasuba, Kasonde, Chileshe, Kangwa na Mukuka
Plot (Ubwanshiko bwa lushimi): Introduction, Rising action, Climax, Falling action, Resolution
Themes: Ukuitemwa, ukukana kwata luse, uluse, icitemwiko, ukubombesha, icilandushi, icikonko
expected_outcomes: Ifibombelo fibomfiwa pakupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe fyabomfiwa bwino-bwino

instructional_blocks.description: Abasambi bashimike ulushimi atemwa umulumbe bapangile
teacher_steps: Eba abasambi bashimike ulushimi atemwa umulumbe bapangile
learner_steps: bashimike ulushimi atewma umulumbe mupangile
expected_outcomes: Ulushimi atemwa umulumbe abasambi bapangile lwashimikwa bwino-bwino

instructional_blocks.description: Abasambi balondolole ifibombelo babomfeshe mu lushimi atemwa mu mulumbe bapangile

learner_steps: Balondolole ifibombelo babomfeshe mu lushimi bapangile

learner_steps: Bapange akasela ukufuma mu lushimi bapangile
expected_outcomes: Akasela kapangwa ukufuma ku lushimi ba pangile bwino-bwino

sub_topics.short_notes: Muli ili sambililo abasambi basambilila ukupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe, kabili basambilila imibomfeshe ya fibombelo babomfya mukupanga inshimi atemwa imilumbe. Basambilila na ukulondolola ifibombelo babomfeshe mu lushimi bapangile elyo basambilila na ukupanga akasela ukufuma ku lushimi bapangile.

vocabulary.definition: Ubwanshiko bwa ilyashi - ifyo ilyashi litantikwe ukushika kumpela
Incende na inshita - uko na inshita ifili mu lyashi filecitikila
Abantu na ifintu ifisangwa mu lyashi
Ifikomo - ifintu fikankala ifyo kalemba alefwaya abalebelenga basambililemo

questions: Bomfya ifisolobelo bakupeele peesamba ulembe ulushimi nangu umulumbe ubutali bwa ulu lushimi bube amashiwi imyanda iibili
Mu mabumba pangeni akasela ukufuma ku lushimi mwaishiba

key_vocabulary.definition: Icongo ico icifuma mukulanda, mukulisha ing'oma nangu icintu icapala akapyelele
Ifintu ifyo babomfya pakubomba umulimo umo
Ifintu fimofimo ifibomba nga inceshi mu milandu atemwa mulyaashi
Umuntu uufunda pa fintu ifyo ashicita
Umusango wakucitilamo ifintu atemwa ifyo icintu caba
Ifishilano fya mutundu ifilanga ifyo umutundu wasuminamo
Umuntu uwaishibisha atemwa uwakwata ububwishibilo bwa cintu ubwapitapo
Ukufwailisha ifintu fimo makamaka pakufwaya ubupilibulo bwacintu
Ukulwishanya kwa itontonkanyo atemwa abantu pakuti pamoneke umukalamba atemwa itontonkanyo lyacimfya
Ukulepula icitenge icisapwike elyo ukucibilinkanya nakabili
Ukumfwa bwino ilyo ulecita ifintu fimo
Kulumbanya icintu atemwa umuntu mukwanga mwishiwi ilyapamulu
Inyimbo shansansa isho abantu beemba ngabali pa maliila atemwa ilyo balenwa ubwalwa
Iyo mucigeleshiu iitwa nga Oral lliterature
Iyo mucingeleshi iitwa nga Written literature

indicators: Ukubomfya amashiwi ayayana mu nshila ishalekana-lekana
Ukwishiba ukumfwa, ukulanda, Ukubelenga na ukulemba
Ukupeela inshita kuli bambi ilyo mulelanshanya
Ukwishiba na ukulumbula amashina ya fintu ifili mu ncende shabo
Ukwishiba ubwampano bwaba pa filembo na ifiunda
Ukwishiba ukwapanya amaenso na iminwe ukubomfya ifipe fyansala
